definitions.title: n.pr. 1. m.
definitions.body: father of Abraham: (a kind of ibex RS:K(1 St ed.) 220 (cf. As. turâḫu, Ar. ta0’ruxun Nö:ZMG xxxlii (1879), 331, Syr. taruwh.o0 capra cauca-sica), but against this Nö:ZMG xl (1886), 167; n.pr.div. Jen:ZA vi. 70);—´[[ת]]: Ge 11:25, Ge 11:26, Ge 11:27, Ge 11:27, Ge 11:28, Ge 11:31, Ge 11:32, Ge 11:32, Jos 24:2; [[תָָּרַת]] Ge 11:24, 1Ch 1:26; Qarra, LXXL Qara.—Vid. Selbie:Hast. DB TERAH.

definitions.title: 2. loc.
definitions.body: station on Exodus Journey Nu 33:27, Nu 33:28; Taraq.
